column4: what version of feisty should be installed on a computer wioth a core 2 duo processor?
for best results, the i386 version
if you don't play games, the amd64 (or 64 bit) version
dont play games...would the 64bit version show a big difference in my computers performance?
not that much, we are only human
if you want flash and realplayer and w32codecs and such, use the i386 version
